descriptionHtml:
Fletching at Forges
--------------------------
===================================
.:: Fletching Vanilla - No Dawnguard ::.
===================================
NOTE: DO NOT GET THIS FILE IF YOU HAVE DAWNGUARD. IT IS NOT NEEDED!
-This adds recipes for all the Base Game Arrows that Dawnguard does, using the exact same Vanilla Recipes.
These arrows are:
-Iron Arrow
-Steel Arrow
-Orcish Arrow
-Dwarven Arrow
-Elven Arrow
-Glass Arrow
-Ebony Arrow
-Daedric Arrow
(THIS FILE IS NOT REQUIRED TO USE ANY OF THE OTHERS. EACH FILE IS A STANDALONE MOD)
=====

If you have Dawnguard, you may download any of the following, however Dawnguard is not required:

====================
.:: Nord Hero Only ::.
====================
-Dawnguard Compatible!
-This file adds only the Nord Hero Arrow, allowing stacks of 24 to be crafted at the Skyforge!
-WHAT YOU NEED:
-The Awakened Skyforge
-24 Ancient Nord Arrows
-1 Steel Ingot
(NORD HERO ARROWS ARE ALSO INCLUDED IN THE ADDITIONAL ARROW PACK!)
=====
==========================
.:: Additional Arrow Pack ::.
==========================
-Dawnguard Compatible!
ARROWS ADDED:
-Forsworn Arrow
-Falmer Arrow (Requires Elven Smithing Perk!)
-Ancient Nord Arrow
-Nord Hero Arrow (Only Craftable at the Skyforge!)
=====
==============
.:: Bow Pack ::.
==============
-Dawnguard Compatible!
BOWS ADDED:
-Long Bow
-Hunting Bow
-Imperial Bow
-Forsworn Bow
-Falmer Bow (Requires Elven Smithing Perk)
-Supple Falmer Bow (Requires Elven Smithing Perk)
=====
==================================================================================
INSTALLATION: Extract the .esp file to your Skyrim data folder (Sorry, no NMM Support).

UPDATING: Delete the old .esp file from your Skyrim data folder. Extract the new version of the file to your Skyrim data folder.

UNINSTALL: Delete \'Fletching.esp\' from your Skyrim data folder.
===================================================================================
author: FlapjacksNsyrup
